trans-unit.source: Enables Windows authentication with client application services.
trans-unit.target: 通过客户端应用程序服务实现 Windows 身份验证。

trans-unit.source: You can use client application services to validate users by using Windows authentication.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用客户端应用程序服务通过使用 Windows 身份验证来验证用户。

trans-unit.source: To enable Windows authentication, you configure your application to use the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用 Windows 身份验证，你可以配置应用程序使用<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。

trans-unit.source: After configuration, you can validate users by calling the `static` <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.ValidateUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 完成配置后中,，你可以验证用户通过调用`static`<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.ValidateUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.ValidateUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method internally calls the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method.

The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method automatically authenticates the current user and sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> object that contains the current <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法自动进行身份验证当前用户，并将设置`static`<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>对象，其中包含当前<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider> is configured for your application, you can use the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> object to retrieve user role information from the roles service.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider>配置对于你的应用程序，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>通过角色服务中检索用户角色信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve a reference to the current <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> instance through the `static` <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.Provider%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检索对当前的引用<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>实例通过`static`<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.Provider%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use the membership provider reference to call the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method directly.
trans-unit.target: 你可使用成员资格提供程序引用调用<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>直接的方法。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you will need the membership provider reference to call the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider.Logout%2A> method, which is not available in the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> base class.
trans-unit.target: 此外，你将需要要调用的成员资格提供程序引用<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider.Logout%2A>方法，在中不可用<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>基类。

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to authenticate a user by using Windows authentication.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法使用 Windows 身份验证对用户进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the value of the `static` <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.Provider%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is cast to a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> instance.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，值`static`<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.Provider%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性被强制转换为<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>实例。

trans-unit.source: This makes sure that a <xref:System.NullReferenceException> will be thrown if you accidentally test this code by using another membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 这将确保<xref:System.NullReferenceException>意外测试，则此代码通过使用另一个的成员资格提供程序将引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This property is not used by this class.
The name of the application using the custom membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用自定义成员资格提供程序的应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置不起作用。

Windows authentication uses the identity supplied by the operating system when a user logs on to the computer or domain.
trans-unit.target: Windows 身份验证使用用户登录到计算机或域时，由操作系统提供的标识。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, properties related to user credentials are not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 因此，用户凭据与相关的属性不相关的此类。

Always thrown.
Logs out the user.

For users authenticated through client application services, the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> object that enables access to the configured role service.
trans-unit.target: 为通过客户端应用程序服务进行身份验证的用户`static`<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>对象，它启用对配置的角色服务的访问。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider.Logout%2A> method resets the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property to a <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal> object that contains the current <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider.Logout%2A>方法重置<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>属性<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal>对象，其中包含当前<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>。

trans-unit.source: After you call this method, you can no longer retrieve roles for the user through the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法后，不再可以检索角色的用户通过<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: To reauthenticate the current user, call the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新进行身份验证当前用户，调用<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to log out the user.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法来注销用户。

trans-unit.source: This property is not used by this class.
The number of invalid password attempts allowed before the membership user is locked out.
trans-unit.target: 锁定成员资格用户之前允许的无效密码尝试次数。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, properties related to user credentials are not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 因此，用户凭据与相关的属性不相关的此类。

trans-unit.source: This property is not used by this class.
The number of minutes in which a maximum number of invalid password or password-answer attempts are allowed before the membership user is locked out.
trans-unit.target: 在锁定成员资格用户之前允许的最大无效密码或无效密码提示问题答案尝试次数的分钟数。

Must be <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 必须为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Must be <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 必须为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Automatically authenticates the current user by using the identity supplied by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 使用操作系统提供的标识自动对当前用户进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="true" />.

When you configure your application to use the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> class, the `static` <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.ValidateUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method will use this method for its implementation.
trans-unit.target: 当你配置应用程序使用<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>类， `static` <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.ValidateUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将使用其实现此方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method automatically authenticates the current user and sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> object that contains the current <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法自动进行身份验证当前用户，并将设置`static`<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>对象，其中包含当前<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider> is configured for your application, you can use the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> object to retrieve user role information from the roles service.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider>配置对于你的应用程序，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>通过角色服务中检索用户角色信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to authenticate a user by using Windows authentication.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法使用 Windows 身份验证对用户进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="username" /> is not <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="username" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="password" /> is not <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="password" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 或 <see langword="null" />。
